vault.title: Vault
vault.description: AES-256 encryption for text and files. Zero-Knowledge, all in your browser.

seo.title: Encrypt Text and Files Online - OHCodex Vault
seo.description: Free AES-256 encryption tool in the browser. Protect your documents, photos, and videos before sending. Total privacy, no servers.

vault.subtitle: Military-grade AES-256 encryption. Zero-Knowledge - Your data never leaves your browser.
vault.alert: All processing happens in your browser using Web Crypto API. Password never sent to any server.
vault.fileAlert: Files are encrypted with the same security. Result downloads with .ohc extension
vault.encryptDesc: Drag a file here or click to select
vault.enterEncrypted: Please enter encrypted text and password
vault.selectFilePassword: Please select a file and enter password
vault.selectOhcFile: Please select an .ohc file and enter password

image-optimizer.title: Pixel Optimizer
image-optimizer.description: Compress, resize and convert HEIC/JPG to WebP in batches.

seo.title: Convert HEIC to JPG and Optimize Images - OHCodex
seo.description: Reduce photo weight, add watermark and convert HEIC from iPhone to JPG/WebP for free. Private processing in your browser.

image-optimizer.subtitle: Compress, resize and convert images (including HEIC) in batches. 100% in the browser.
image-optimizer.privacyAlert: EXIF metadata automatically removed for privacy

pdf-studio.title: PDF Studio
pdf-studio.description: Merge, split, sign and compress PDFs in a professional interface.

seo.title: Online PDF Editor: Merge, Sign and Compress - OHCodex PDF Studio
seo.description: Free tool to manage PDFs. Organize pages, sign documents digitally and reduce file size. No registration and secure.

pdf-studio.subtitle: Merge, rotate and organize PDFs directly in your browser.
pdf-studio.infoAlert: This is the basic version. For advanced features like compression and signing, additional implementation is required.
pdf-studio.dropzoneSubtitle: Or click to select files. 100% private local processing.
pdf-studio.privacyAlert: Your documents are never uploaded to any server. Merging and signing happens in your browser.
pdf-studio.needTwoPdfs: Select at least 2 PDFs to merge

data-station.title: Data Station
data-station.description: Format JSON, convert CSV/XML, validate SQL and compare code diff.

seo.title: JSON Formatter, CSV Converter and SQL Online - OHCodex Data Station
seo.description: Validate JSON, convert CSV to JSON, format SQL and compare code. Free, private and serverless developer tools.

data-station.subtitle: Format, validate and convert data directly in your browser.

qr-factory.title: QR Factory
qr-factory.description: Generate custom QRs with logo and EAN-13, UPC barcodes.

seo.title: QR Code and Barcode Generator with Logo (SVG/PNG) - OHCodex
seo.description: Create custom QRs for WiFi, VCard and WhatsApp. EAN-13 and Code-128 barcode generator for inventory. Free vector download.

qr-factory.subtitle: Generate custom QR codes and barcodes professionally.

ocr-vision.title: OCR Vision
ocr-vision.description: Extract text from images and scanned documents. Local AI technology supporting multiple languages.

seo.title: Free Online OCR with AI - Extract Text from Image - OHCodex
seo.description: Free OCR tool to convert images to editable text. Runs in your browser with AI (Tesseract). Supports Spanish, English, and more.

ocr-vision.subtitle: Transform images into editable text instantly. Total privacy: your ID or invoices never leave your device.
ocr-vision.placeholder: Recognized text will appear here for editing...

password-gen.title: Password Generator
password-gen.description: Generate secure passwords and memorable passphrases with customizable options.

seo.title: Secure Password Generator - Strong Random Passwords - OHCodex
seo.description: Free password generator tool. Create strong, secure passwords and memorable passphrases. Client-side generation for maximum security.

password-gen.subtitle: Generate secure passwords and memorable passphrases. All processing happens in your browser.

security.title: 100% Private & Secure
security.description: All passwords are generated locally in your browser using the Web Crypto API. Nothing is sent to any server.

jwt-decoder.title: JWT Decoder
jwt-decoder.description: Decode and inspect JSON Web Tokens. View header, payload, and signature with expiration validation.

seo.title: JWT Decoder - Inspect JSON Web Tokens Online - OHCodex
seo.description: Free JWT decoder tool. Decode JSON Web Tokens to view header, payload claims, and verify signature. Check token expiration instantly.

jwt-decoder.subtitle: Decode and inspect JSON Web Tokens. View header, payload claims, and verify token validity.
jwt-decoder.inputDescription: Paste your JWT token here to decode
jwt-decoder.invalidToken: Invalid JWT format. Token must have 3 parts separated by dots.
jwt-decoder.signatureDescription: The signature is used to verify the token's integrity and authenticity.
jwt-decoder.signatureNote: Note: This tool decodes tokens client-side. Signature verification requires the secret key, which should never be exposed in client-side code.
jwt-decoder.enterTokenHint: Enter a JWT token on the left to see the decoded output

regex-tester.title: Regex Tester
regex-tester.description: Test, debug and validate regular expressions with real-time highlighting and explanations.

seo.title: Regex Tester & Debugger - Online Regular Expression Tool - OHCodex
seo.description: Test and debug regular expressions online. Real-time match highlighting, regex presets, and cheat sheet. Free client-side regex tool.

regex-tester.subtitle: Test, debug and validate regular expressions with real-time highlighting and explanations.
regex-tester.uploadFileDesc: Select a file to encode to Base64
regex-tester.presetsDescription: Click to load common regex patterns

tip.title: Pro Tip
tip.description: Use capturing groups () to extract specific parts of your matches. They appear in the results panel.
